page.title: 19Pipe Hall Farm Hamstall R.
page.content: Day in life of farmer John Smith. 250 acres dairy/cereal farming. Workers John and Richard Smith,Andrew Page. Thursday July 4th 1985. 06.00 John rises,listens to farming programme for current news and prices. 06.45 Fetches cows from night pastures into herring bone milking parlour for automatic milking and feeding.54 milked =795 litres. 08.00 Andrew arrives;cows to day pastures,cleans parlour and yard Richard irrigates potato crop with water pumped from River Trent 1"in 8hrs 09.00 Breakfast-porridge,bacon and eggs toast and marmalade,tea to drink. 09.30 Sterilisation of milking parlour. 10.00 R.services combine harvester. 11.00 Milk collected-Birmingham tanker. 12.30 Dinner.13.30 R.and A.demolish old building.14.30Irrigation pump blocked. 15.30.J.fetches cows for milking.Contin demolition.17.30 End of official day.
